title: To LOVE-Ru: Abunai Girls Talk
original_name: To Love る 危ないガールズトーク
sinopse: Based on the popular manga To-Love-Ru, the novel begins with Haruna and her friends at karaoke, having a "girly talk" something risque... Haruna has an erotic dream and says to her friends?! Saki working as a nurse?! This new publication, full of splendid illustrations, shows a facet of heroines that can not be viewed in the manga.
